services.q: What does an IT consultant do?
services.a: An IT consultant assesses your technology, recommends improvements, designs solutions and helps implement strategic projects to meet business goals.

services.q: Why should my business hire an IT consultant?
services.a: A consultant brings experience and objectivity to solve technical problems faster, reduce risk, optimise costs and align IT with your business strategy.

services.q: Can you help integrate new software into my current systems?
services.a: Yes — we design integration patterns, build connectors, plan data migrations and validate end‑to‑end workflows to ensure smooth adoption.

locations.a: We are based out of Ostrava and serve clients across the Czech Republic and EU; onsite visits available where needed.

locations.q: Do you offer remote IT consulting?
locations.a: Yes — most work can be done remotely; we combine remote collaboration with onsite visits for workshops or deployments.

locations.q: How quickly can we start working together?
locations.a: Initial discovery within days, proposal in 1–2 weeks, project start once scope and terms are agreed.

process.q: What is your consulting process like?
process.a: We start with discovery, define goals, design solutions, implement in phases and validate results with KPIs and knowledge transfer to your team.

process.q: Do you provide one-time consultations or ongoing support?
process.a: Both — one‑off advisory sessions, project engagements and retainer-based ongoing support as needed.

process.q: Do you offer a free consultation?
process.a: Yes — a short introductory consultation to understand needs and propose next steps at no charge.

security.q: Can you help with cybersecurity audits?
security.a: Yes — security assessments, vulnerability reviews, policy audits and remediation guidance are available.

security.q: Do you sign NDAs with clients?
security.a: Yes — we sign NDAs to protect confidential information before detailed discussions or access to sensitive data.

security.q: How do you ensure my company’s data stays secure?
security.a: We follow security best practices, use encrypted channels, apply least-privilege and help implement controls and policies.

results.q: How will IT consulting improve my business?
results.a: Consulting improves efficiency, reduces downtime, enables better decisions and aligns tech investments with business objectives.

results.q: Can you help reduce IT costs?
results.a: Yes — via optimisation, consolidation, automation and cost‑effective cloud/licensing strategies to lower TCO.

results.q: What ROI can I expect from working with you?
results.a: ROI varies by project; we define measurable KPIs during discovery and focus on tangible outcomes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Vadatei ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacy.personalInfoText: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
privacy.personalInfoContact: Contact us through our website or email
privacy.personalInfoDiscovery: Schedule a discovery call or consultation
privacy.personalInfoIncludes: This information may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, job title, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy.autoInfoText: We may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns, including:
privacy.autoInfoPages: Pages visited and time spent on our website
privacy.useInfoText: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.useInfoProvide: Provide and improve our consulting services
privacy.useInfoRespond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
privacy.useInfoSchedule: Schedule and conduct discovery calls and consultations
privacy.useInfoSend: Send you relevant information about our services
privacy.useInfoAnalyze: Analyze website usage and improve user experience
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except:
privacy.sharingProviders: To trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
privacy.sharingLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.sharingTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or merger
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsDelete: Request deletion of your personal information
privacy.rightsCopy: Request a copy of your personal information
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
